While @POTUS blames the situation in Ukraine for higher energy prices, the energy crisis goes much farther back. Don't forget that the first thing he did on Inauguration Day was cripple American energy production. The blame rests on his shoulders.

https://t.co/UsU6hi1YaO

One thing is clear: weak leadership in the White House ripples across the globe. 

See my full statement on Biden's inadequate response to Putin ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/udGvzs9PwG

Even CNN says Romney was right - 10 YEARS LATER

Obama & Biden mocked him for calling Russia our greatest geopolitical foe. It's been true for well over 10 yrs, but Democrats are just now catching up. 

Biden's incompetence puts every American in danger. 

https://t.co/uqcRmsVfv4
Should opportunistic leaders in China or Iran decide to further test the US, it would spell disaster.

Putin's received the assurances he wanted regarding Ukraine's NATO status; even before the invasion began, Putin was already the victor. 

He's shown that his tactics work. A weak @POTUS is unable to stop him.
We're only in this situation because Putin is taking advantage of Biden's weak leadership.

Russia is invading Ukraine at this very moment. 

World leaders are speaking out, levying intense sanctions on Russia, but we have heard nothing from @POTUS. 

This is a moment for true leadership. The world is watching. Our allies are watching. 

What will @JoeBiden do?

I join countless friends and family members across the country in mourning the passing of @RepHagedorn. He dearly loved his country and dedicated his life to building a better future for the people of Minnesota.

Please keep his loved ones in your prayers.

.@RepChipRoy is right.  Overreaching COVID-19 policies have been a disaster for our country.  It's time for them to go.  I strongly encourage all of my colleagues in the Senate to vote against any measure that funds vaccine mandates.

https://t.co/OeEcg97OaA

It's a shame to see what DC did to small businesses like @thebigboarddc over a ridiculous mandate they reversed days later.

I enjoyed meeting Eric a few weeks ago - a Navy veteran who loves his community & his employees. I hope the city restores his business & gives him justice!
People are flooding to our southern border from over 160 countries worldwide because the Biden Administration has sent them an open invitation.  Plain and simple.

I'm back on @newsmax in a few minutes discussing the dire situation at our Southern border.

It's time for @SecMayorkas to go!
This Administration has gone as far as allowing illegal immigrants to use arrest warrants as a form of ID to board planes.  Can you imagine if we used a parking ticket to try to get on an airplane?
This is not just a border issue anymore.  Every state in our country is dealing with this Administration's failures at our Southern Border.

I've been to the border multiple times and seen what's going on.  I've seen how effective President Trump's border policies were.  As a leader, you should move forward with policies that have a proven record of success, not repeal them for purely political reasons.

The border crisis poses a very real danger to millions of Americans. Biden & Mayorkas continue ignoring it, but Americans are demanding accountability. 

Thanks to @jimmyfailla & @foxnewsradio for having me on to discuss this important topic today!

https://t.co/0WgTEEmGwx
@SecMayorkas has turned ICE Agents into travel agents.
@SecMayorkas' lack of action on the Southern Border is literally killing Americans.  It's amazing that this Administration simply will not send anybody down there to see what's actually going on.
I'll be on @foxnewsradio with @jimmyfailla at 1:35pm CT - there's a lot to talk about today!
A weak Commander-in-Chief puts the entire world in danger. Our enemies are emboldened & our allies have lost faith in us under Biden's leadership. https://t.co/OuEQIcwePK

Yesterday, I voted against yet another short-term spending bill that would fund the Department of Labor's unconstitutional vaccine mandate. In October, I pledged to vote against any federal funding for DoL until Biden abandons the mandates - I stand by that commitment.

Pelosi has failed to write a budget every year as Speaker, but we have a clear, conservative vision to restore fiscal responsibility & avoid a debt crisis! https://t.co/JZKNW8D8Jr

Fentanyl is now the leading killer of Americans aged 18-45.  The opioid crisis is at an all-time high, our Southern Border is wide open, and the Biden Admin’s solution is to use leftover COVID-19 relief funds to send people drug paraphernalia.  Unbelievable. https://t.co/tMo79Aw5PE

It’s a shame we cannot pass a clean bipartisan bill to accomplish a very bipartisan goal, but this is par for the course with Speaker Pelosi.

Our number one priority in any bill targeting China should be to limit the threat from the CCP. Unfortunately, the Democrats’ bill did very little to combat China, but included many progressive wish-list items from the Green New Deal.

Today I voted against the America CONCEDES Act.  Every member of this Congress recognizes the imperative need for the United States to be the preeminent global power, and the threat China poses the U.S.

Thank you to my good friend @SteveScalise for the cake celebrating the passage of my bill, H.R. 1298, to rename the Owasso Post office after 1st District hero Technical Sergeant Marshal Roberts! https://t.co/0q6bLVAwqr

https://t.co/3NC4ChDNgm
Pretty soon we're going to run out of characters to fit all of Biden's crises in one tweet.

Human trafficking is morally wrong, illegal, and a huge issue at our southern border.  Biden's open border policies have exponentially worsened the problem.  ANY company who is complicit in the smuggling of human beings in ANY regard is on the side of the cartels - not America. https://t.co/dTeatWfSzj

This Administration is continuing to lie to the American people with the goal of passing trillions of dollars in progressive wish-list spending.  Unfortunately for them, the American people are smarter than that. https://t.co/zHCPmZK1UW

I, along with nearly 50 of my fellow Republican lawmakers, also recently signed a letter led by @RepChipRoy reaffirming our commitment to vote down ANY measure that provides funding for vaccine mandates.  We will not stop until the mandates are wholly abandoned.

I have been opposed to all federal vaccine mandates since their inception.  In November, I led a press conference with over 30 of my colleagues where we affirmed our commitment to stand against this heinous attempt at government overreach from the Biden Administration.
Handing off this special bill to @SenatorLankford to get through the Senate and onto @POTUS’s desk! https://t.co/Qm8shlAraS

America is facing a mental health crisis - among countless others that have arisen during the past year of one party, one rule.  Today I had the opportunity to question witnesses at the @WaysandMeansGOP hearing on the Mental Health Crisis in America.  Watch below 👇 https://t.co/1BLyCqSkxR

As Oklahoma prepares for a major winter storm, be alert for the possibility of power outages and other risks that accompany a storm like this. Please visit https://t.co/qzePGp1qJC for more info on best practices during inclement weather. Stay safe!

https://t.co/0In8TQfnj1

Very proud to report that my bill to rename the Owasso Post Office after Oklahoma hero Technical Sergeant Marshal Roberts has passed the House!  This small but meaningful gesture will ensure that his heroism and sacrifice are remembered for generations to come. https://t.co/hKKY9gqrfv

About to speak on the House floor about my bill to rename the Post Office in Owasso after the late Technical Sergeant Marshal Roberts - tune in!

Truckers kept our country running while most other industries were shut down; they’re the lifeblood of this country and continent.  I’m proud to stand with our Canadian friends fighting for their freedoms!  Stripping people of their livelihood over this personal choice is WRONG.
Thank you! Oklahoma will always stand with our friend Israel. https://t.co/Th40CGOYvo

Today is International Holocaust Remembrance Day. On this solemn day of reflection, we remember the millions of innocent lives taken in the 1930s and 1940s, as well as reaffirm our responsibility to fight antisemitism in all forms. https://t.co/8mi9vLV0Ze

Happy National School Choice week! I'm a staunch believer that parents know what's best for their children and have a right to be involved at every level of their education.  #SchoolChoice
@CoachMarley Congratulations Caden!
I hope that the President can figure that out before our global competitors take advantage of his willful lack of action.

My fellow Republicans and I remain committed to our international allies and will condemn acts of aggression from those who wish them harm, even if the White House refuses to do so. Appeasement is not a rational or sustainable policy – deterrence through strength is.

At his press conference last week, the same man said that he would possibly tolerate a “minor incursion” into Ukraine.  Now, Russian forces are positioned along their border, poised to invade at any time. It’s clear what Mr. Putin thinks of our esteemed Commander-in-Chief.

It's almost hard to remember the Joe Biden who said on the campaign trail: “Vladimir Putin doesn’t want me to be President… because I’m the only person in this field who’s ever gone toe-to-toe with him.”  What a change a year makes.
To our enemies around the world, it proved that our current leadership has weakened our resolve – America is not the international superpower we used to be.

Thanks to the President’s weak leadership, our enemies are emboldened, & our allies are losing faith in us. Our catastrophic withdrawal from Afghanistan resulted in the deaths of US servicemembers and our Afghan allies, leaving the country in the hands of a terrorist regime.

🧵

Yesterday, the President said he probably “overperformed” expectations in his 1st year, but his approval rating is 33%: the lowest first-year approval rating for any President in history.  His presidency is defined by failure, & his party will see the consequences this November.

Biden promised that he'd “end the opioid crisis”. Due to his negligent border policies, the cartels have near-total control. Fentanyl is flowing into our country at the highest volumes ever & it is now the leading cause of death for Americans aged 18-45.

https://t.co/LOMpMXSMWK

Biden promised to remove all Americans from Afghanistan. After a disastrous and poorly planned withdrawal, there are currently hundreds of Americans still stranded and 13 American servicemembers dead. 
 
https://t.co/N4LwS1eYgk

Biden promised to advocate for the American worker, but his policies are harming working class Americans the most. Due to #Bidenflation, real wages have shrunk by at least 3%, and American families are paying an average of $3,500 more on basic goods.
 
https://t.co/6lL0lw64CF

Biden said he would not mandate vaccination against COVID-19.  8 months later, he reversed course. If it weren’t for the Supreme Court, all businesses with 100+ employees would be forced to comply. His mandate on the healthcare sector remains in place.

Biden promised to “shut down the virus, not the country”.  A year later, more Americans have died of COVID-19 during his presidency than under the previous Administration, and our economy remains stagnant under Biden’s punitive economic policies. 
 
https://t.co/QmvZ6q79FV

Biden promised to unify our country & said we “have to stop treating our opponents as enemies”. Now, the country is as divided as ever, and the President continues to stoke that flame with repeated attacks on the Americans who disagree with his agenda.  

https://t.co/HlwlEElmG3

Today marks the 1-year anniversary of Joe Biden’s Presidency.  During his campaign, the President made numerous grandiose promises to the American people.  After 365 days in office, let’s see how it’s going: 

🧵

Proud to stand with @GOPLeader, @SteveScalise, and @HouseGOP as we look back on President Biden’s disastrous first year in office.

We will continue to fight everyday for the American people. https://t.co/SHnhr8gplP

A President's words carry immense weight. No amount of cleanup from White House staff will change the alarming comments @POTUS made about Ukraine & Russia yesterday. Our allies and friends must be able to trust us, but this president continues to prove we are an unreliable ally.

How can the President possibly claim that he's gotten the "critical crises" out of the way when inflation is reaching the highest levels it's been in 40 years, our southern border is wide open, and our store shelves are empty?
The President, who is directly responsible for the deaths of 13 of our heroic servicemembers in Afghanistan, is refusing to apologize.  Unbelievable. https://t.co/A1DvvuLbw8

@POTUS: "Name one thing Republicans are for."
 
Border security, lower inflation, lowering federal spending, and protecting the American people against gross government overreach, just to name a few.

You're still 4 million jobs short of pre-pandemic levels, Mr. President.

https://t.co/8u1KmfrbAl https://t.co/ke96hwislH
Very proud to receive an A+ rating from @SBAList!  I will always fight to protect life! https://t.co/XzjcH8QwNe

President Biden's first year in office has been an unmitigated disaster.  His Administration has time and time again refused to address real problems that the American people care about.  Our country would be much better off if he simply got out of the way. @RepublicanStudy https://t.co/1wmFsJ3rEI

#BuildBackBroke: dead

As Democrats push to pass a radical federal takeover of elections, the irony is not lost on me that they want to ban Voter ID – claiming it's racist – in the same city where you now need to have a photo ID AND a vaccine card to go to the gym, go out to eat, or buy groceries.

December saw inflation rise to 7%.  This is the highest it's been in 40 YEARS, and a continuation of the rise that we've seen every single month since the President took office.  #Bidenflation is stifling growth, destroying small businesses, and suffocating American families. https://t.co/j7ayYSZMpg

It is the duty of both governments to return to the negotiating table and work together on solutions, especially at a time when American families are suffering under the weight of record-high inflation.  We are ready & willing to discuss this problem and its potential solutions.

The Department of Commerce’s decision to increase antidumping and countervailing duties on certain softwood lumber products from Canada will have severe consequences on new housing construction and the costs faced by hardworking American families.

#BuildBackBroke is officially dead - hopefully, the end of this bill marks a return to fiscally responsible leadership.
Only 1 House Democrat was willing to do what Manchin is doing and vote against their party’s bad bill.
If we learned anything this year, it’s that MORE spending isn’t the answer. It doesn’t work; in fact, the spending from this year has left us worse off than we were at the start.

I applaud @Sen_JoeManchin for sticking to his conscience and his values, putting the future of our nation above partisan games.

He’s absolutely correct that #BuildBackBroke would make America less competitive and more vulnerable to threats of all kinds. https://t.co/rgxJG3QBvE

The biggest barrier, Madam @VP, is that most Americans can't afford a luxury EV, due in large part to the 6.8% inflation rate which YOUR Administration has written off as a "high class problem".

The Biden Administration is impossibly out of touch with the American people. https://t.co/gTQLr81vuk

Happy birthday, @USNationalGuard!

Our current leadership should be taking common sense steps to solve the inflation crisis.  Instead, they're blaming small businesses for their problems and claiming that wasting trillions of taxpayer dollars will cost nothing.

The Biden Administration laying the inflation blame at the feet of businesses is further proof that they have no idea how business actually works.  

Raising prices due to increased taxes and production costs isn’t “absurd and unfair.”

It’s simple math.

America is experiencing the highest inflation rates in 39 years, and the only solution that Democrats have offered is an expanded debt ceiling and trillions of dollars’ worth of federal spending.  

It’s glaringly obvious: our current leadership puts taxpayer needs last.

#Bidenflation 

https://t.co/4I02NkgOj4

Today we celebrate the inspiring life of Senator Bob Dole as he lies in State at the Capitol. Bob was an American hero who exemplified Patriotism, honor, dignity, and respect. May his legacy inspire us all to serve the American people with strength and integrity.
Every crisis in our nation’s capital can be traced back to the budget.
All this could have been avoided had @SpeakerPelosi written a budget this spring. Not only did she fail to draft a budget, she instructed her Budget Committee Chairman not to even attempt it.

The American people don’t trust these swampy maneuvers; they see through the false statements from Democrats who control the White House and both chambers of Congress yet blame their gridlock on Republicans.

Instead of working ahead to avoid a default on our debts, Democrats waited until the last minute and are trying to rewrite the rules of the Senate instead of using the tools already at their disposal, like the reconciliation process.

Earlier this year, I led over 100 of my colleagues in the House in the commitment against voting for a debt limit increase. 

Our GOP colleagues in the Senate signed a similar commitment, giving the Democrats several months’ notice that they would need to do this on their own.

Tonight, I voted against a swampy maneuver that allows the Democrats to circumvent the filibuster in the Senate in order to raise the debt limit - something they already have the power to do using reconciliation, the process they’re already using for #BuildBackBroke

80 years ago today over 2000 Americans made the ultimate sacrifice at Pearl Harbor.  Today and everyday we remember our brave soldiers who answered the call when our nation was attacked on this "date that will live in infamy". https://t.co/u2ZnXmWjAF

While I agree that no diplomat should attend the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics, this boycott is the bare minimum. China’s repeated human rights violations cannot continue to go unaddressed. It’s time to get serious about standing up to the CCP.

Saddened to learn of Bob Dole’s passing today.  I had the honor of meeting Bob on Capitol Hill a few years ago. He was a true American hero who exemplified everything that makes our country great. May he Rest In Peace. https://t.co/OQuT5acCeB

Earlier this year, I introduced the No Budget, No Pay Act as a part of my Roadmap to Congressional Reform package.
